thread.title: Sideshow: Civil suit fingers Nick Gordon in Bobbi Kristina Brown's death
thread.title_full: Sideshow: Civil suit fingers Nick Gordon in Bobbi Kristina Brown's death

title: Sideshow: Civil suit fingers Nick Gordon in Bobbi Kristina Brown's death
text:
Tirdad Derakhshani, Inquirer Sideshow Columnist Posted: Saturday, October 10, 2015, 1:07 AM Disturbing allegations 
Was Bobbi Kristina Brown 's July 26 death caused by her boyfriend, Nick Gordon ? New documents in a civil lawsuit filed by Brown's family say Whitney Houston' s 22-year-old daughter went into the months-long coma that preceded her death after Gordon injected her with a "toxic mixture" and placed her unconscious in a bathtub. The suit accuses Gordon of assault, battery, intentional infliction of emotional distress, and transferring money from her account into his without authorization. 
Brown "died following a particularly violent altercation with [Gordon] that left her battered and bruised, with a tooth knocked out," reads the suit. Gordon has denied all allegations. Goodman transformed 
John Goodman , 63, was almost unrecognizable at the London premiere of his new movie, Trumbo . The actor, who has weighed as much as 400 pounds, looked half that size. His rep told ABC News it's all down to exercise and a good diet. More coverage In 2010, Goodman told David Letterman that controlling his weight had been a lifelong struggle. "I'm not going to look like Paris Hilton or anything," he said. Gossip petits fours 
Victoria Beckham , 41, this week visited with women and children in Ethiopia in her role as a goodwill ambassador for the United Nation's HIV/AIDS outreach program, UNAIDS. . . . Halle Berry won't be delivering any more alien babies: The star's sci-fi vehicle Extant has been killed by CBS after two seasons. But the network has signed Berry to exec-produce its forthcoming legal drama, Legalese , says USA Today. . . . Film composer and pianist John Williams , 83, has become the first composer to snag the American Film Institute's Life Achievement Award. Williams, who has 49 Oscar noms - the most of any living person - will be presented the award in June at the AFI gala. Sad news from Sanchez 
Glades alum Kiele Sanchez , 37, has suffered a late-term miscarriage, a rep for Sanchez and her husband, fellow actor Zach Gilford , tells People. The baby, which was due next month, was to be the couple's first.
